blogPost.excerpt: Blogstreak is the tool library for your blog. If you want nice clap and comments for your static blog then look no further blogstreak has the answer. Blogstreak using latest webcomponent technology so it's highly customisable.
blogPost.body: Blogstreak is the tool library for your blog. If you want nice clap and comments for your static blog then look no further blogstreak has the answer. Blogstreak using latest webcomponent technology so it's highly customisable.
blogPost.title: Blogstreak - All things needed for running static blog
blogPost.author: Raja Simon

localize.description: Blogstreak是你博客的工具库。如果你想为你的静态博客提供漂亮的掌声和评论，那么不用再看了，blogstreak有答案。Blogstreak使用最新的webcomponent技术，所以它是高度可定制的。
localize.tagline: 运行静态博客所需的所有东西

localize.description: Blogstreak是你博客的工具庫。如果你想爲你的靜態博客提供漂亮的掌聲和評論，那麼不用再看了，blogstreak有答案。Blogstreak使用最新的webcomponent技術，所以它是高度可定製的。
localize.tagline: 運行靜態博客所需的所有東西

previous.excerpt: uPaste for Mac will record and organize your copy/paste history automatically. Then you can use your pasteboard content anytime, any where with elegant beautiful UI.
previous.title: uPaste - Smart clipboard manager for Mac

localize.description: uPaste for Mac将自动记录和组织您的复制/粘贴历史。然后，你可以随时随地使用你的粘贴板内容与优雅美丽的用户界面。
localize.tagline: 适用于Mac的智能剪贴板管理器

localize.description: uPaste for Mac將自動記錄和組織您的複製/粘貼歷史。然後，你可以隨時隨地使用你的粘貼板內容與優雅美麗的用戶界面。
localize.tagline: 適用於Mac的智能剪貼板管理器

next.excerpt: Hypernotes is a knowledge management app with bi-directional linking, outlining, and super-powered collaboration features.
next.title: Hypernotes - Create, share, and understand knowledge in a new way

localize.description: Hypernotes是一款具有双向链接、勾画和超强协作功能的知识管理应用。
localize.tagline: 以新的方式创造、分享和理解知识。

localize.description: Hypernotes是一款具有雙向鏈接、勾畫和超強協作功能的知識管理應用。
localize.tagline: 以新的方式創造、分享和理解知識。
